items.sentence: Mary was lonely because the other students didn\'t talk to her.
Tom was stabbed with a kitchen knife, but he\'s going to be OK.
Tom wasn\'t able to get everything done that needed to be done.
Tom and Mary haven\'t yet told anyone they plan to get married.
Tom and Mary hugged each other and kissed each other\'s cheeks.
Tom and Mary know each other, but they\'re not exactly friends.
Tom was badly in debt for a while, but he\'s on his feet again.
What\'s the best way to tell someone that you don\'t like them?
I know it\'s going to be unpleasant to talk about the accident.
I made Tom promise that he wouldn\'t tell anyone what happened.
